column1: # SOURCE: Synthetic data based on diesel generator manufacturer specifications
# DESCRIPTION: Diesel backup generator specifications for small-scale community microgrid

# LOGIC: Fuel consumption varies with load factor - higher loads more efficient. Typical diesel generators 30-40% efficient. Minimum load ~30% to prevent engine damage. Startup time 2-5 minutes for small generators. Willans line fuel model: fuel_L = (a * P_rated + b * P_gen) * hours
column2: where a is no-load coefficient and b is incremental coefficient.

column1: # ASSUMPTIONS: Backup power for critical loads; diesel fuel available in Egypt; small-scale community microgrid (50-200 kW); costs in 2024 USD; fuel consumption at 75% load factor

column2: Egypt. Use case: Backup power for critical loads. Fuel: Diesel (available in Egypt). Scale: Small-scale community microgrid (50-200 kW).
